content: The following are the national records in track cycling in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), maintained by its national cycling federation, [Singapore Cycling Federation](/wiki/Singapore_Cycling_Federation). ## Men EventRecordAthleteDateMeetPlaceRef[Flying 200 m time trial](/wiki/Track_time_trial)10.491Mohamed Elyas Bin Mohamed Yusoff21 June 2022[Asian Championships](/wiki/2022_Asian_Track_Cycling_Championships)[New Delhi](/wiki/New_Delhi), India[Flying 500 m time trial](/wiki/Track_time_trial)[500 m time trial](/wiki/Track_time_trial)33.626Mohamed Elyas Bin Mohamed Yusoff11 January 2019[Asian Championships](/wiki/2019_Asian_Track_Cycling_Championships)[Jakarta](/wiki/Jakarta_International_Velodrome), Indonesia[Flying 1 km time trial](/wiki/Track_time_trial)[1 km time trial](/wiki/Track_time_trial)1:03.929Mohamed Elyas Bin Mohamed Yusoff29 August 2017[Southeast Asian Games](/wiki/Cycling_at_the_2017_Southeast_Asian_Games)[Nilai](/wiki/Nilai), Malaysia[Team sprint](/wiki/Team_sprint)46.967[Darren Low](/wiki/Darren_Low) Mohamed Elyas Bin Mohamed Yusoff [Lance Tan Wei Sheng](/wiki/Lance_Tan_Wei_Sheng)27 August 2017[Southeast Asian Games](/wiki/Cycling_at_the_2017_Southeast_Asian_Games)[Nilai](/wiki/Nilai), Malaysia[4000 m individual pursuit](/wiki/Individual_pursuit)[4000 m team pursuit](/wiki/Team_pursuit)4:35.246[Lance Tan Wei Sheng](/wiki/Lance_Tan_Wei_Sheng) Calvin Sim [Goh Choon Huat](/wiki/Goh_Choon_Huat) [Darren Low](/wiki/Darren_Low)29 August 2017[Southeast Asian Games](/wiki/Cycling_at_the_2017_Southeast_Asian_Games)[Nilai](/wiki/Nilai), Malaysia[*citation needed*][Hour record](/wiki/Hour_record) ## title: List of Singaporean records in track cycling
